1.content:
Welcome to Haven Healthcare. It's technically a nursing home, but we're not going anywhere near the elderly residents here. They mostly stay in thier rooms anyway, and we don't want to be there.

You're a member of the kitchen staff, most likely a male. But if you're a girl, that can be arranged. Let's meet the staff, shall we?

The Boys:

Chris, 21- A buff, white boy wanna be rapper with big dreams of joining G-Unit. He's big and tough and considered by many to the cutest boy in the department. His head is shaved and he has a short beard starting from his sideburns. He had a brief romance with Ashley, which ended when she was too shallow and too bitchy, and she claimed he wasn't her type because he was "too nice". He hasn't endeared himself to Ashley's best friend Lindsey, either. But recently rehired Alexa seems to want him bad.

Jarred, 21- While Chris is the "cutest", Jarred is Number Two. He's thin and athletic and a bit soft-spoken but he's definetly a tough guy. Long face, bright eyes and short blonde hair. Jarred is currently having regular sex with Erica, though they have yet to commit to a full relationship. He hates Ashley and Lindsey, and vice versa.

Nate, 23- Short and stocky, Nate isn't going to win any beauty contests, but he is considered by many(especially many of the adult female staff members at the facility) to be very handsome. Nate thinks Alexa is really cute and is turned on by Ashley and Lindseys' bitchy attitude, but the one he really likes is Erica. Marissa, a recently hired teenager, slapped Nate with a sexual harassment charge, which he was innocent of.

Phil, 18- Energetic comedian type, Phil takes nothing seriously. He used to date Erica and currently flirts a lot with Marissa, who wants him bad.

Ryan(AKA Harry), 17- By far the most unpopular staff member, Harry is lazy and stupid and very ugly. He's entirely too hairy(hence the nickname...however, he also resembles an ugly, hairy stocky Harry Potter) and a little lecherous. He works with his best friend Brian(who isn't going to be in the story) and Brians' girlfriend Monique, whom Harry secretly adores.

Dave, 21- The youngest cook at Haven, Dave is big, strong and a little angry at times. He's very soft-spoken and is pretty easy-going, but when he's angry he's dangerous. His two sisters both work at the facility, as does his Brother. Had a few dates with Noor.


The Girls:

Ashley, 19- A bitch, likes trouble and talks a lot of trash when she's not sleeping with...well, anyone she wants. Very pretty brunette with blonde streaks, bright eyes. Very Gangsta. Had an affair with Chris, and goes off and on with how she feels about him.

Lindsey, 21- Another Bitch, Ashley's best friend. A little overweight, but still pretty with bright hazel eyes and jet black hair. She despises Chris and Jarred.

Alexa, 19- Short and pudgy(but natural) brunette. Like Ashley but less honest about it. Bright Hazel eyes, light brown hair. She currently wants to seduce Chris. She's also unaware that Nate harbors a small crush on her. She's very close to Erica and Hannah(listed further down)

Marissa, 17- Bright green eyes and a developing teenaged body. She's jailbait, however, and slapped a sexual harassment charge on Nate. Very cruel minded and sexually premiscuous. Wants to get Phil into bed.

Emily, 17- Marissas' best friend, Emily is a much better worker and seems nicer than the cruel Marissa, but that's uncertain, since many haven't gotten to know her. She's got dirty blonde hair and is very pretty with big lips and even bigger boobs.

Erica, 20- Erica has been around Haven for a while. She's very pretty but very slight. She has blonde hair down to her shoulders which she often wears up in a ponytail or bun. She's currently dating Jarred(at least from her perspecive mostly) and is unaware of Nate's crush on her. She used to date Phil for a long time, and is very close with Alexa.

Noor, 20- Noor is a very tall, almost model-like girl with middle eastern decent. She's very pretty but materialistic and a little snobby, mostly coming from her wealthy parents. Her best friend is Katie from Housekeeping, and she is madly in love with Chris.

Monique, 16- Monique is a tall, pretty-in-an-odd-way girl with tan skin and a large nose. She's thin and favors gothic-style clothes and the like. Her boyfriend Brian has worked there for a long time, and she's unaware of Harry's intense crush on her.

Erin, 24- Erin is Dave's sister. She's a little overweight, but not as much as Lindsey, and is passionate but very nice and laid back. She has a pretty smile and eyes, but her forceful personality is what really makes her attractive. Dislikes Ashley, Lindsey, Marrisa and Emily.

Other Girls from around the Facility:

Shelly, 30- Shelly is a beautiful woman of Italian decent who is currently the human resources manager of Haven. She's very beautiful and very playful. She seems nice, but might have a mean streak....

Katie, 20- Katie is a larger girl, very tall and broad, but she still has a girl-next-door beauty that makes her very well liked. She has a large, goofy smile and blushes easily, which brings out the color in her big green eyes. She's a housekeeper at the facility. She's also Noor's best friend.

Lisa, 31- A very pretty but petite woman, Lisa is the Assistant Director of Nursing at Haven. She has big yellowish-green eyes and a big smile and shoulder length wavy brown hair. She's known to be a bit of a brat when she doesn't get her way and can be very rude, as if everyone she meets is beneath her.

Jamie, 31- Marissa's Mother and Lisa's best friend. Jamie is a tall, statuesque woman with short red hair and bright green cat eyes like her Daughter. Lisa is considered rude, but Jamie is far ruder. She acts like she's Queen of the World.

Meghan, 22- Meghan is a friend of Ashley and Lindsey and is an amazingly beautiful young woman who works at the receptionist. She favors pants suits and high-heeled boots, but also pumps. She has long straight black hair and the general look of a model, moving with grace. She's known to be a slut, and more than a little bratty.

Hannah, 20- Hannah is Dave's younger sister. She's very energitic and personable, making her a valuable member of the activities staff. She has frizzy brownish blonde hair and likes to wear comfortable, casual clothing, and every day she wears the same gray fuzzy clogs. Occasionally, she dislikes Alexa(and sometimes they're best friends) and is very close with Dave and Erin. She's also a close friend of Phil and Erica.


Now, then...who are you?
1.title: Going the extra mile at Haven

11.content: "...another day of this mo-not-any has gotten me to a point I'm like a snail I got to formulate a plot or end up in jail or shot! Success is my only motherfuckin' option, failures not...!" Chris rapped along with Eminem in the dish room, tossing dishes into the soapy water. So what if he had to do dishes alone, doesn't mean he can't enjoy himself. It was only temporary anyway, he was gonna be a huge rapper. He'd made his own name, Dub-CK and he was gonna be HUGE! He opened up the dishwasher and pulled free some dishes and turned to put them on the drying shelf. As he did this, still nodding his head to the beat, he tripped on a fallen dishwasher wrack and fell down hard, causing his CD to skip and a breif shock to pass through his body from the wall plug. There was a bright blue flash and then he was lying face down on the wet ground. He then stood up and noticed that the dishroom had gotten bigger. A lot bigger! He could only be...
11.title: Word up, Chris!  Or is it down?

113.content:
Chris stood up and was shocked. He was like those kids in that movie! The dishwrack he had tripped over was like a building now. He was standing ankle deep in water that was nothing more than a layer of film from a normal size perspective. He then heard some loud booming noises and a pair of thunder-like voices:

"YEAH, THAT WAS WICKED FUNNY! DID YOU SEE HARRY'S FACE WHEN MONIQUE WAS KISSING BRIAN YESTERDAY? THAT WAS PRICELESS."

"YEAH, HARRY IS A WEIRDO."

"WHO WAS DOING DISHES TODAY?"

"CHRIS, I THINK..."


They were definetly female voices, and he knew exactly who they belonged to...
113.title: So much for being a HUGE star...

choices: They go smoke and leave Chris alone
They do dishes now, inadvertently hurting him
1131.content:
Chris began to shake as he watched Ashley turn the corner into the dishroom, her massive grey and white sketchers squealing on the dishroom floor. He followed those massive shoes up past her tone legs in tan khakis to his bare-midrift and peirced belly button just below the hem of her tight pink shirt. Her huge face was above it, and he was both terrified and in awe. He always thought Ashley was hot(he wouldn't have slept with her otherwise...), but now she was amazing. Like a Goddess.

"CHRIS? WHERE ARE YOU?" Ashley's voice boomed.

"WHAT, HE'S NOT IN THERE?" Lindsey's thunderous voice called from the other room. He heard louder booms and turned around to see Lindsey walk in on the other side of the room, her huge tattered white sketchers slamming monstrously on the tiled floor of the dishroom that currently acted as his world. Lindsey looked as if she might stop, but instead she continued to move in his direction! Those huge white sneakers slammed the ground, shaking him and knocking him onto his ass. He shouted as her massive right foot smacked hard before him as she reached to pull a rack of dishes from the still open dishwasher. "I CAN'T BELIEVE HE'D JUST TAKE OFF."

"WELL, MAYBE HE'S OUT SMOKING OR SOMETHING. OR MAYBE HE HAD TO DELIVER SOME FOOD SOMEWHERE." Ashley said, shifting her left foot forward and putting one hand on her hip. She then reached down and absently played with her belly-button ring, something that had always made Chris turned on. But he quickly turned to see the gigantic white sneaker of Lindsey beside him. Up past her meaty legs and navy blue work shirt was her massive head with long black hair and her chubby red face. He never liked Lindsey, but now he was terrified. He'd always given her an attitude, but now he was like a bug at her feet. Smaller than that, probably, since he'd have to jump and pull himself just to reach the toe of her shoe!

"DAMMIT, I WAS HOPING TO GO HOME EARLY, BUT NOW WE'LL HAVE TO FINISH HIS DISHES." Lindsey shouted, causing Chris to cover his ears.

"WELL, LET'S GO HAVE A CIGARETTE FIRST. MAYBE HE'LL COME BACK OR SOMETHING. I MEAN, FUCK, I DON'T WANNA DO HIS DAMN DISHES." Ashley said. Lindsey looked at her, completley unaware of her miniscule co-worker helpless at her feet.
1131.title: Big Bitches

12.content:
Nate was pissed. Once again, he was forced to put the stock away, alone is the stuffy closet. He hated doing this, he was way too short to put things away properly on the top shelf, but then again he was always asked to do something, because if he didn't do it, no one else would. It was total bullshit, and he knew it.

It was typical, though, the day he was having. He'd cut himself by accident on a knife earlier that morning, he'd been forced to serve breakfest and what was worse, he was asked to stay late again tonight. God, did he hate that. And to top it all off, Marissa was working. Marissa, the little bitch that had accused him of sexually harassing her. She was seventeen and he was twenty-three! He wasn't that type of guy at all. He was trying to be nice to her on her first day, and apparently she'd taken his gentlemenly gestures the wrong way. That, of she decided she didn't like him, and wanted him fired. He'd smack her, if he was that way.

Unfortunetly, his submissive nature stopped all of that. What made it worse, he almost found her more attractive because of that nature.

"God dammit!" He shouted, dropping a box on his foot, "Bloody hell!" He stooped to retrieve the box, his cut hand suddenly throbbing. He cursed again as he say the box had busted open, and a jar of some green stuff was mixing with some other fallen condiments. "Oh, bollocks." He said softly, "Now I've gotta clean it up." he reached down to gingerly grasp the larger peices of broken glass, when some of the green stuff came into contact with his cut. It burned like hell for a moment, and then stopped. He looked up and suddenly gasped. Things were different.

He had shrunk to...
12.title: A bad day made worse

choices: One of the other girls walks in
121.content:
He estimated he was only an inch tall. He gazed up at the massive shelves, and to his left was the mess of green goo and broken glass. "Oh, just bloody great." He muttered to himself. He walked away from the liquid, before he shrank any smaller and wandered about. "Okay, so what do I do...it seems that this green shit made me like this...and it came in with the order. So, there must be something in the order that can fix it. Hopefully." He turned around and saw a mountain of boxes behind him. It could take him days to get onto that, let along get inside and look around. There were only six boxes or so, but that could take a little guy like him weeks! What a nightmare! God, how could this day get any worse?

He then began to hear it. Not only that, but he could feel it.

*BOOM*

*BOOM*

*BOOM*

"Oh, bollocks...footsteps..." He said to himself, turning around and seeing the massive door. The steps stopped, and Nate, waiting with baited breath, watched it click and squeak open.
121.title: One Inch Tall Nate

1211.content:
Nate didn't know what to do when he watched a gigantic Marissa step into the cramped store room. Her white and pink sneakers shook the floor and he marveled at seeing her body work beneath her tan pants and tight pink shirt. Her massive face was framed under her long brown hair and those gleaming cat eyes scanned the shelves. "OKAY, WHAT DID HE DO WITH THE OATMEAL...?" She asked aloud, unaware of the tiny man on the floor.

Nate found himself wondering what she'd do if she found him down here...would she think he was a bug and step on him? Would she step on him even if she found out it was him? He had no idea how Marissa would react to his tiny form, and he wasn't sure he wanted to find out at all. He began to run for the safety of the boxes as she began to move again.

She walked further into the room, her massive right foot landing just inches from Nate before moving on to the shattered jar of green stuff. "WHAT THE HELL, DID SOMEONE SPILL THIS AND NOT CLEAN IT UP?" She asked herself aloud, her slight country accent showing through. She sighed exasperatly and bent over to clean it up.
1211.title: Hiding from Marissa

12112.content:
Marissa picks up some broken glass and moves some more of it with her foot and then walks out of the room. Nate sighs in relief until Marissa returns with a broom, dustpan and mop bucket. Nate hides out while she cleans, wondering just why Marissa didn't shrink when she touched the gunk, too.

Marissa hummed to herself as she worked, tapping her foot, which was maddening to Nate, who tried to stay hidden from Marissa and her massive feet and cleaning supplies. Any of it was deadly to him now. But as he watched her tight butt wiggle as she worked, as he watched her massive feet and legs moved and her prety face smiling and humming, he found himself tempted to throw himself to the wolves. Maybe she'd help him, or maybe she's kill him, but at the moment...she was all he had. At least, for now.

She finished her chores and placed everything in a corner and rolled up her sleeves, looking down at the clean floor with satisfaction. Nate, gathering up his courage, stepped out from behind the boxes and waited to see if Marissa would see him, or what her initial reaction would be.

"WHAT THE HELL...?" Marissa said from high above, like the voice of God echoing down from the heavens. Nate cringed as he saw her step closer to him, peering down at him. "EWWW...A BUG. I HATE BUGS." Marissa said.

"No, no....Marissa, I'm not a bug!" Nate cried. Marissa lifted up her massive foot and he saw the pink bottom of her shoe rise up high in the air and start to come down at a startling speed. He dove out of the way and began to crawl hurriedly as her foot crashed hard onto the floor. She lifted her foot and examined it, but not seeing his squished guts, she started hunting for him again.

"WHERE DID YOU GO, YOU LITTLE SHIT..." She said, undoubtedly quietly to herself, but to the tiny man running away from her, it was like a loudspeaker. She got down on her knees and looked around the boxes.

Nate lost sight of her as he walked around the boxes. There was no sound, no footsteps or even breathing. He wondered if in all of the excitement she'd left without him noticing. He stopped to breath, looking behind him. It was then that he turned around, and looked straight into Marissas' gigantic green eyes.
12112.title: Marissa's bug hunt

121121.content:
"NATE, IS THAT YOU?" She asks, a small smile playing across her lips.

"Um...yeah, Marissa...it's me." Nate says, feeling even smaller under her gaze.

"YOU'RE SO SMALL..." She says, once again quietly to herself but loud to him.

"Yeah...please, Marissa...I need your help." Nate says. Marissa laughs.

"YOU NEED MY HELP? YOU THINK I'D HELP YOU, YOU LITTLE PERVERT? AFTER ALL THE FLIRTING AND HARASSMENT YOU PUT ME THROUGH, AND I'D JUST HELP YOU OUT?" Marissa asked, grinning.

"I never harassed you!" Nate cried.

"NO ONE'S GONNA KNOW THAT...YOU'RE TOO TINY TO TELL ANYONE." She reached out a finger and placed it next to him, "YOU'RE SMALLER THAN MY FINGER! THIS IS SO COOL!" She said.

"Please...you have to help me, Marissa, I'm begging you. I'll do anything you want!" Nate cried. Marissa smirked.

"I KNOW YOU'LL DO ANYTHING. YOU'LL DO ANYTHING I TELL YOU OR YOU'LL BE A STAIN ON MY SHOE." She stood up to her full height and stood up straight, her massive shoes lining up directly in front of him, pushed together. She tilted her right foot back and raised just her sole over your head, just a few feet. "THAT'S ALL IT TAKES. JUST A LITTLE TILT ON MY HEEL, AND DOWN MY SOLE COMES. AND YOU GO SQUISH, AND NO ONE WILL EVER THINK TO LOOK FOR YOU ON THE SOLE OF MY SHOE." Marissa says. She then removes her shoe and kneels down again, looking at you close.

"What are you going to do with me?" Nate asked nervously.

"I DUNNO YET. I THINK FOR STARTERS I'LL PUT YOU SOMEPLACE SAFE UNTIL THE END OF THE SHIFT, AND THEN I'LL TAKE YOU HOME WITH ME." Marissa said.

"Please, I just want to get big again."

"AND I WANT REVENGE FOR YOUR FLIRTING WITH ME. IT WASN'T NICE FOR ME, AND FOR THAT YOU'RE GONNA PAY. NOW YOU CAN BE A GOOD LITTLE PET FOR ME, OR YOU CAN GO SQUISH. NOW...CLIMB INTO MY HAND." Marissa said, laying her hand down flat, palm up.
121121.title: Marissa's proposition

14.content: Or, one of the Girls?
14.title: Girls just wanna be shrunk...or grow?

choices: She's a small person inside, she shrinks
She's a bigger person, the building shrinks
142.content:
Lunch ended and Lindsey sat down for a cigarette, sitting alone in her car. Her best friend Ashley had elected to stay and flirt with that asshole Chris. She lit her cigarette between her thick fingers and sighed, closing her eyes and reclining her seat. She opened her eyes and saw a flier on her windsheild. Groaning with a little dissapointment, Lindsey opened her car door and stepped out, snatching the flier angrily from under her windsheild wipers. She figured it was some sort of prank, maybe some idiotic note from Chris or Jarred at her expense. She looked at it and furrowed her brow in confusion.

"Your true self revealed when you say the words 'Khunish del ghort mahash'?" Lindsey read aloud. Suddenly, she felt her body changing.
142.title: Lindsey's Big Day

choices: She tells Ashley about the flier
1422.content:
Before Lindsey even comprehended what was happening, she noticed she was looking at her workplace between her massive feet. The entire building was maybe only a single shoe size larger than her right foot, and the ceiling fell just short of reaching the top of her tattered white sketchers. "WHOA, I AM FUCKING HUGE!" She said, and then giggled at the sight again. She shifted her feet without thinking, and watched a massive cloud of dust envelope Haven Healthcare. She looked down and saw that her heel had trod upon a group of cars in the parking lot.

She looked around and saw everything else the same size. The road was just on her right, and the house next door was the same size it always was. So it was just Haven that shrank!

She turned her right foot over and saw the tiny vehicles embedded in the treads of her sneakers heel. "THIS IS FUCKING SWEET." Lindsey said, looking down at Haven. "CHECK IT OUT, EVERYONE...LINDSEY IS THE BOSS NOW." She bellowed and watched as dozens of tiny specks filed out of the doors to gaze up at her massive form. She could barely see them! The building was barely larger than her shoe, which meant that all of the workers and residents could set up shop inside her right shoe! Nevermind her left! "MAYBE I COULD RENT OUT MY SHOES AS APARTMENT BUILDINGS." She said with a laugh. She wondered about the specks at her feet, she wondered if they were scared. Unconcerned about her surroundings, Lindsey laid down so her massive face was directly in front of the service entrance and stared at the tiny people who struggled against the force of just her breathing out her nose. "HI EVERYONE." She said simply, and grinned as they all looked so very nervous.

"Lindsey?" Ashley asked, her voice barely reaching Lindseys' massive ear drums.

"YEAH, IT'S ME! ISN'T THIS SO FUCKING COOL?! I'M GIGANTIC." Lindsey replied.

"How did you get so huge?!" Ashley asked
1422.title: Outgrowing Haven

choices: They put the building into Lindsey's car
14221.content:
"GO OVER BY MY CAR...THERE'S A FLIER THERE. READ IT OUTLOUD." Lindsey commands. Ashley, shivering against Lindseys' massive breath and covering her ears against Lindsey's booming voice, rushes over to the side of Lindsey's now miniscule car. When other people tried to follow, Lindsey smashed a huge hand in front of them. "NUH UH." She said, warningly. Ashleyn picked up the flier and looked over at the Giantess.

"I just read it out loud?" Ashley asked.

"YEP. OH, AND MAKE SURE YOU'RE TOUCHING MY CAR. I CAN'T DRIVE HOME IN A MATCHBOX RACER." Lindsey said. Ashley placed one hand on Lindseys' driver side window and read the flier aloud, and suddenly she saw Lindsey lying on the ground in front of her and the car, and in front of Lindseys' massive face was a huge group of tiny specks.

"WHOA, THIS IS TOTALLY FUCKED." Ashley said, and laughed loudly when she saw the little specks cover thier tiny ears at the sound of her voice. She looked around and then down at the building. "HEY, WE'RE NOT EVEN GIANTS...THE BUILDING IS JUST TINY NOW." Ashley said with a laugh.

"YEP, WE'RE TOTALLY BIGGER THAN THIS PLACE."

"OUR TRUE FORMS...WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?" Ashley asked as Lindsey stood back up beside her and the two gigantic girls gazed down at the little antfarm at thier feet. Lindsey shrugged. "DOES IT MEAN THAT WE'RE BETTER THAN EVERYONE HERE?" Ashley asked. Lindsey grinned.

"I'D SAY SO...WE'RE GIANTS AND THEY'RE SPECKS NOW. LOOK HOW SMALL THAT BUILDING IS, IT'S BARELY BIGGER THAN MY FOOT!" Lindsey said, placing her massive right foot on the roof. She put a little weight down and grinned at the little cracks that formed in the roof.

"SO WHAT DO WE DO NOW?" Ashley asked.
14221.title: Two Giant Girls

choices: Ashley and Lindsey are on thier way outside!
144.content:
Noor was pretty much well known for talking down to people, when she talked to them at all. Noor had "standards", a product of her living environment with her parents mixed with too much television. She wanted to be popular and well-liked, but didn't know how to do it on her own...so she bought it, as best she could and did what she could to maintain a reputation as only talking to people who were attractive. And damn, was Chris really sexy....

Noor was walking down the hall when she overheard Ashley and Lindsey talking just inside the kitchen. She stopped and listened, pulling her long black hair back as she did so and taking off of her coat.

"Noor thinks she's so fucking cool." Ashley said.

"Yeah, she's so snobby and rude. And the way she sniffs around Chris....so very pathetic." Lindsey concured. Noor stifled a gasp, already feeling tears.

"She's so rude to Nate, too. I mean, Nate's not all that, but he's a nice enough guy. There's no reason for her to ignore him like that. Just because he's not up to her "standards". Like anyone cares who she's seen with at work?" Ashley continued, stopping to tie her shoes.

"One of these days, I'm gonna cut that hoe down to size." Lindsey said. Noor, instead of listening more, ran away closer to the exit door, tears already coming to her eyes. It was true, she was nervous about being seen with guys like Nate...but no one liked her anyway, so what did it matter? She stopped near the entrance and cried.

"Everyone hates me...I wish I could just dissapear"

And with that, to anyone who was watching her, she did. Noor looked up and saw the enormous exit door, the keypad that opened it high above her. Like, miles above. She was tiny. Her eyes widened and his mouth came open as she stared up, and then turned and screamed.
144.title: Noor's comeuppance

15.content: Or, one of these poor blokes?
15.title: Someone else?

choices: Dave goes out for a smoke
Dave stays and keeps working on the food
151.content:
Dave grunted to himself as he put the finishing touches on his pork chops before placing them in the oven. He looked at his watch and saw it was Two-Thirty in the afternoon. As per usual, he was left understaffed, with only five day people who all were gone now. The next crew would come in at Three-Thirty, and there really wasn't enough of them, either. He cursed Randy's ability to schedule people.

He walked over to pull out some stored vegetables from the fridge to use as his puree for the evening, when he saw a container of some strange looking substance marked "Unsure, 3-21-05". He rolled his eyes.

"You guys have to try stuff if you don't know what it is." Dave said to himself with a frustrated groan. He took the container out of the fridge and peeled off the plastic wrap. He didn't recognise the handwriting on the wrap, and so he took a sniff of the stuff. It didn't smell too bad, kind of a vegetable smell. He grabbed a spoon and scooped up some and put it in his mouth. Surprirsingly, it tasted pretty good. Maybe he could use it as his puree tonight instead of having to puree some saved veggies. He placed it on the counter and looked at his watch again.
151.title: Understaffed

choices: Dave shrinks right there on the chair
1511.content:
Dave looked at his watch and decided he had time for a break. He walked outside without a coat and sat down in the little green plastic lawn chair and lit his smoke. His stomach made a weird gurgling sound, but he ignored it and smoked his cigarette in peace.

It was a nice day, sunny and mild. It was a little windy and that made his sweaty skin chilled, but the sun was nice and warm. Spring was coming, and he found himself forgetting how stressful his evening was going to be. He leaned back and closed his eyes, taking another drag of his smoke, humming an underground rap song to himself. His stomach gurgled again, this time louder and a slight cramp came with it. His body began feeling numb and tingly all at once, like all of his limbs went to sleep at the same time. He opened his eyes and looked down and saw his feet had left the ground.

"What the hell?" Dave exclaimed.
1511.title: Those things are bad for you

choices: She starts to sit down on the chair
She continues to stand near the chair
15111.content:
Within minutes, Dave found himself standing in the center of a massive green chair, almost like standing on top of a building in a big city. He looked down over the edge and estimated he could be miles up. "Oh, shit...what the hell am I gonna do now...?" Dave asked, looking around for a solution. There was no way he could jump, and even if he did, what could he do then? Walk the miles and miles to the front door and then somehow get in and contact someone? He tried not to panic and finished his cigarette. "Why did this stuff shrink with me?" He asked himself aloud, looking at his clothes and the objects in his pockets. As he examined it, he found what he thought could be salvation: His Cellphone. He opened it and dialed the number of his sister, Hannah. She was still at work somewhere in the facility, wasn't she?

"Hello?" Asked a voice on the other end.

"Hannah! It's Dave!" He yelled.

"Hello?" She asked again, "Dave...I can't hear you."

"Hannah! I'm fucking tiny outside on the chair!"

"Dave, I can't hear you. Try calling me back, there must be something wrong with the connection." Hannah replied.

"Fuck!" Dave roared, closing his phone. He was too small to be heard, apparently. His number would have been on her caller ID, but she couldn't hear him. He then heard the front door open and a woman cough. He looked up and saw Shelly, The Human Resources Manager, sauntering his way wearing a white blouse with a black mini-skirt and black stockings, her feet clad in black pumps. She had her long curly hair pulled back and a pair of glasses perched on her long nose. She was a hotty, but now she was a goddess.

Shelly put a cigarette in her mouth and shivered against the breeze. "SHOULDA WORE PANTS..." She said to herself. Dave shook his head.

"Shelly! Down here, on the chair!" He started shouting as she approached his little world. She stopped short of the chair, putting him about level with the middle of her black skirt. He looked up past her breasts to see her smoking her cigarette and shaking.

"DAMN, IT'S COLD...WHY DIDN'T YOU TAKE A JACKET OUTSIDE, SHELLY?" She asked herself, "GOD, IT'S BEEN A LONG DAY..."
15111.title: Company

choices: He tries to get Shellys' attention
He falls off the chair to the ground
151111.content:
Dave screamed in spite of himself as Shelly turned around and began lowering her shapely backside down onto his current perch. "Shelly! No!" He cried, backing away. He bumped into the back of the chair and closed his eyes, putting his hands up as if to block the falling fleshy sky. He heard a crash and a creaking noise, but didn't feel the amazing crushing sensation he figured he'd feel.

He opened his eyes to see that her butt had come to rest directly in front of him, mere inches away from his diminutive form. He looked up and saw her lower back connecting to the green plastic surface just above him. He wiped some sweat from his brow and laughed a little. He survived!

But what now? He gazed up at the beautiful massive form of Shelly and tried to think of options. Her cigarette break wouldn't last long, so he had to think quick. As he thinking, she started shifting in her chair, putting him in danger.
151111.title: Butt why?

1511112.content:
Shelly shifted her weight in the massive chair and then began to turn it a little, causing Daves' world to begin upheavel. He tried to hold his balanced, but found himself tumbling down to the ground. Surprisingly, he survived the impact, but felt like his ribs were cracked. He crawled behind one of the front legs of the chair and looked out and up, seeing her massive form sitting there like a Queen lounging on her throne.

He looked over and saw Shellys' black-shoed feet moving around, shifting from side to side, kicking dirt up around the massive toes. The heels were several times his size, and they were a daunting and intimidating sight at his tiny size. He watched the titanic structures move incredibly fast, and began to sweat again. What could he do?

Without warning, Shelly crossed her right leg over her left, dangling her shoe from her foot. He could see her shapely feet stretching against thier black nylon prison, and once again felt intimidated and scared. He was taller than her before, but now he was some insignifigant insect wandering around at her enormous feet. She didn't even know she had almost sat on him, or that now her playful dainty feet could crush another human being flat. In the time he contemplated this, Shelly shifted her weight again, and her massive left foot scraped across the ground further beneath the chair, nearly deafening the miniscule cook. He dodged out of the way of the train-like shoe, but Shellys' foot was anything but still. Her foot twisted and rocked back on it's heel, dangling her sole above his head.

"Oh, shit..." Dave cried, and dove forward as the massive sole playfully slammed down extra-hard, almost like an angry bull. He landed flat on his stomach and looked up, seeing that he was now safely under the arch of her heel.

"GUESS I BETTER GET BACK TO IT..." He heard Shelly groan and watched her foot move back to position.
1511112.title: Load off her feet

15111121.content:
Dave stares up as Shelly reaches her full hight. We watches in horror as she drops her cigarette from high up directly above his head.

Dave rolled to the side as fast as he could and watched the cigarette land with what seemed to him to be a tremendous impact less than a foot, from his point of view, away. Sparks flew from the end, one of the embers landed on his back.

Dave screamed in pain before the ember burned out. But was terrified when he saw what Shelly was doing now. He looked up to see her sole right above him, ready to extinguish both the cigarette and him.

Shelly dropped her foot hard onto the cigarette and ground it under her foot. "I guess I should get back to work."

She walked away from the flattened cigarette, and the tiny man she never noticed.
15111121.title: cigarette break over

choices: Harry goes in search of help
152.content:
Ryan grinned vacantly as Dave told him to go clean up the kitchen on the other side of the facility, and after a few minutes of loafing, he went and did as he was told. He was excited, truth be told, because Monique was working over on that side with Marissa and Emily, and while the latter two were hot, Monique was still the girl for him. He was kind of glad his friend Brian had called out today, since it gave him more time alone with her.

Carrying his sloshing bucket of soap and water, Ryan(or Harry, as he was known to everyone, including Monique) waddeled down on his short legs and straightened his glasses. Showtime.

He entered the fancy dining room and found it empty, and was dissapointed. Sighing to himself and humming an Ozzy Osbourne tune, Harry lazily started doing what Dave had instructed him to as he half-heartedly began to wipe down a counter top. He worked for about five minutes and decided to take a break, and opened the fridge and found a bunch of milks. He pulled one free and looked at the date and, even after seeing that it was a week over it's expiration date, Harry drank it anyway.

Immedietly he started to feel sick, and then fell to the floor, clutching his stomach. He tried to run out of the kitchen into the dining room, figuring he could make it from there into the hall where a nurse would see him, but Harry couldn't even get to his feet. His eyes closed beneath his thick glasses, and he lost conciousness.
....................

As he awoke, he found he felt a better. A lot better. He felt lighter somehow, cleansed. He got to his feet and searched for his glasses, which he found quickly at his feet and placed on. It was then that his guts dropped out.

He was standing in front of a gigantic milk carton, normally a simple 8 ounce milk, now the size of a trailer to him. "Dude, this is totally crazy. I must be dreaming." He walked up and looked at the carton closely, measuring himself against the picture of the cartoon cow on front. It was about as big as him. "I've shrunk! Whoa...this is interesting..."
152.title: Shouldnt've taken that break, Harry

choices: Erica wants to nap in his office between shifts
Shelly needs to talk to him about paychecks
154.content:
Randy was the food service director at Haven, and was well-known(but not officially) to be a bit of a womaniser. He had, allegedly(and he wasn't talking), slept with multiple women at the facility, and had been rumored to even try and get his own female employees into bed. He wouldn't exactly put it that way, but he'd suggested to Ashley...she was a looker. He was only thirty, and she was legal...but these rumors wouldn't look good to his now ex-wife, who might take his two children from him.

He was an attractive man, standing at 6'2" and being in excellent shape...but no one knew offically just how much of a scum bag he was. No one, except his ex-wife, Sarah.

He was getting ready to leave, when his phone rang. He picked it up. "Hi, this is Randy."

"You son of a bitch."

"Sarah?" He asked.

"You bastard...I know about you and your little trollops at work. I hope you can feel what this does to me, you son of a bitch. How you make me feel so small and unimportant. I was never good enough, you bastard."

"Sarah, please..." the phone went dead.

"Oh, fuck." He said to himself. He got up and grabbed his keys, determined to go over there and talk to her. He could lose his kids, the only thing he cared about. He rushed to his door, but suddenly doubled over in pain. "Argh...must be those pills I popped earlier..." He said, and spots flashed before his eyes. When his vision cleared, he was staring at the crack under his closed door. "Oh my god..." He said, "What were those pills?" He then saw his doorknob turn, and the door open slowly.

"RANDY...? MUST HAVE GONE HOME ALREADY..." Randy was shocked when she stepped in...
154.title: ....like a woman scourned

1541.content:
Erica sticks her head inside the door, looking around briefly. "I GUESS HE WENT HOME ALREADY..." she said to herself, and plopped down in his swivel chair, her enormous black converse sneakers just missing his tiny form as she did so. She leaned her head back and closed her eyes.

Randy watched her move with uncanny speed and sit down in his chair. She was going to take a nap in his office during her break...Randy ran towards her massive foot and began punching the toe, trying to ignore how much it hurt his hand. "Erica," He yelled, "I'm down here! Please, Erica, you have to help me!" But Erica was oblivious. She lifted her other foot and spun the other desk chair around to face her and, terrifying her now miniscule boss, raised the foot he had been banging on.

Randy threw himself on the ground, narrowly avoiding having his head taken off by Ericas' enormous feet. He shivered at how insigifigant he'd now become, almost being killed by the dainty foot of his twenty year old subordinate!

She lifted her feet up and crossed them at the ankles on the other chair and leaned back, her breathing slowing down.

"Shit...she's going to sleep. She's never going to hear me like this.
1541.title: Giantess Nap

info.brief_description: Shrinking in a kitchen you work at.  Don't like it, don't read it.  Beeyotch.
info.description: It's a normal day at Haven Healthcare, and you're a worker in the lowly Kitchen. The plus side is, you work with a LOT of cute chicks. You can be one of the boys, or you can be a girl. One day, a bizarre incident makes a member of the staff shrink and find themselves at the mercy of thier fellow workers... Add whatever you like, try to keep giant men out of it if possible. And no short entries, please. It ruins it for the rest of us.
